<h5 style="text-align: center;"> Helping users make informed decisions </h5>

<hr>
---

The Gaviota Region Interactive Planner is designed to visualize and explore spatial environmental data, with a focus on three primary axes: Natural Resources, Environmental Threats, and DEJ/EJ issues. Its goal is to help users make informed decisions regarding land-use and natural resource conservation.

The app is part of a group project for the Master of Environmental Science and Management of the Bren School, at the University of California Santa Barbara. The project sets de foundation to create a decision-making framework to assist Jack and Laura Dangermond Preserve, local agencies, stakeholders, and rightsholders in setting collaborative priorities and developing a region-wide conservation management plan.
